website_summaries.verdict: An elegant crystal glass that is even larger than many on the market.
pros: A good value for the price

customer_reviews.title: Best wine glass you can own!
customer_reviews.text: Your guests will be impressed! This is THE wine glass to own. The name Spiegelau is etched inconspicuously on the base. These elegant 'Salute' glasses are tall, perfectly balanced to swirl and view, have a very thin lip and tight opening which comfortably fits the nose to fully appreciate the bouquet. Gorgeous 'clink' sound when toasting. See their durability/commercial use video. Glasses are tipped over on different counter tops and do NOT break, even marble! I'm amazed at the quality, you will be proud to own them.
customer_reviews.author: Tupelo Honey

customer_reviews.title: Good value and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very thin, which I count as a real plus. The seller packed them exceptionally well. Consequently they arrived in perfect condition. I can recommend them highly for those wine drinkers who prize a delicate rim against the lips.
customer_reviews.author: San Juanderer

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses for us common folk.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about wine glasses, but I do know these are very nice in your hand and are good quality. I am sure 5% of wine enthusiasts will really not like these, but for everyone else, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a reasonable price...
customer_reviews.text: I like the slightly thicker - and therefore more durable - stem. Most competitive glasses have carried thin stems to ridiculous extremes. We hand wash our wine glasses, so it is literally possible to snap the thin ones while washing and drying them. Perfect size (capacity), height, and shape for us...just what we were looking for, with a bonus of the usual high Spiegelau quality. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Don From Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Thin enough to feel good, but durable as well
customer_reviews.text: I have no major complaints here. They feel very nice to hold. We've broken two of the original four glasses we bought, but that was our fault. I'm impressed how well they've survived. At about $10/glass I got them to break and not feel bad, but they've held up really well. We've put them in the dishwasher many times and they've survived that too. As we and our guests continue to break them we will continue to buy replacements.
customer_reviews.author: choodak

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck!
customer_reviews.text: The original order had 2 of 4 glasses broken. Alerted the sender and a new shipment was sent. On the day of the second delivery, it says "order canceled". Good luck getting 4 glasses! :-( That said the size would have been awesome if not for the broken stems. They would not have even fit in my cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: michael whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, just be careful who you buy from
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of stemware. However, when my shipment came two of the white wine glasses were broken. Amazon sent me another box, that too came and a glass was also broken.I have noticed when buying these that different sellers package much different. My champagne flutes came and were just fine, just be careful. All in all the glasses are lovely and weightless.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, thin, tall stemmed white wine glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! So lovely to drink a super cold sav blanc. I will be buy more! Surly they will break over time, as they are indeed very thin and the nature of glass is to inevitably break. They gorgeous glasses though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are made to last and continue to be clear and spotless after numerous dishwasher cleanings. I hope the brand Spiegelau continues to be great now that Riedel has acquired them.
customer_reviews.author: ronnileee

customer_reviews.title: Also good for red wine!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed by the shape of the glass. Very good for professional tasters. Also would be good for light/medium bodied red wines as well!
customer_reviews.author: NMG

customer_reviews.title: Flawed glass
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses in height and capacity, but could see an imperfection line running down bowl of glass and could feel a raised seam on the stem. Sadly returned.
customer_reviews.author: TeamR

customer_reviews.title: Packed better
customer_reviews.text: It was not left inside my mailbox as stated but was packed well with no breakage. Unlike the first set. Thank you. Really nice glasses
customer_reviews.author: Karl Liesinger

customer_reviews.title: So so so sophisticated....
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how they look on screen. No cracks, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Would think they were much more expensive wine glasses. Will reorder more!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M OHara

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy glass
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my mom for Christmas, we love them! They are durable and very elegant looking. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They are beautiful and elegant. I looked for quite a while for glasses that were the right size and shape and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent glass in terms of shape, size, and build. Terrible sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I am a wine drinker. I ordered red wine glasses and received a different product.. beer glasses, I don’t even drink beer. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and classy
customer_reviews.text: Love spiegelau wine glasses ...I swear wine taste better out of good glasses
customer_reviews.author: MT. H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wine glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice wine glasses. They arrived on time and were not broken!
customer_reviews.author: Mulevad

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great 🍷!
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant and durable glass. The nose area is smallish but the bowl is ample and curvy. The stem is long and sturdy. The overall architecture makes me feel like I picked up my best friend every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: George Richard Butler, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Simple but very elegant, noble-looking, comfortable to hold - just ideal to enjoy a glass of a good white wine.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Poretski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses once I got the stickers off of the bottom. Soak in hot soapy water for about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J-Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They are beautiful and elegant. I looked for quite a while for glasses that were not too large and had the perfect shape, these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses but unfortunately one arrived broken. Packaging could be better
customer_reviews.author: connie williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses but hard to clean since the top part of the glass is very narrow
customer_reviews.author: evas

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, everyday stemware
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, everyday stemware. Dishwasher safe, and strong enough to not feel to fragile in normal usage (unlike a set of Riedels we have, which need to be babied). They are a little tall for top rack dishwasher usage (at least in our Bosch), but "angle in" okay to use there if we don't overload that rack. There are also very nice Schott glasses that are worth looking at, if you're interested in these. Their stems are a little shorter and they edges taper a little more elegantly, without sacrificing durability. But they're a little harder to find, and can run about 25% more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Taco Meow Meow

customer_reviews.title: Not as high quality as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I own several Riedel glasses. I like them, but not their price. And they are very easy to break. So when it came time to replace them, I had hopes these Spiegelau glasses might be ‘good enough’. I didn’t expect them to be the same quality, but I was hoping for them to be close. Unfortunately they aren’t close enough. One of four glasses had a bubble in the side of the glass. When you rotate them in the light you can see the inconsistencies of the glass. These might be OK for everyday use, but I guess I’ll have to keep looking or pay the price for Riedel glasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Definitely very thin lipped glasses, decent for what you pay, I got the white wine glass and would say it’s a little to small of an opening, the red wine glasses are probably more of what a white wine glass should be for opening wise. Probably wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good receptacle/conveyor of one of the necessities of life (as Thomas Jefferson said of wine)
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses, especially for the price. They do justice to the wine they carry, and are elegant and a pleasure to hold and raise to one's lips. One warning: they are quite tall, and might not fit in most cupboard closets in an upright position. That was the case with me. But I found an easy work around by laying them on their sides.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: I adore these glasses. They are a fantastic price for the quality. If we move into a bigger home, I will be getting another set of four to match.
customer_reviews.author: SVP

customer_reviews.title: I’m so enchanted with this glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and such a beautiful resonance event on a slight carres The size improves the taste to such a caliber because it helps to airate 😁🍷🍷
customer_reviews.author: jorge alvergue

customer_reviews.title: arrive broken  (one glass of 8)
customer_reviews.text: Great wine glasses have used for many years.On reorder of eight, one arrived with a broken base. I will not ship broken glass back, Just want replacement
customer_reviews.author: Grandparents

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, perfect size for a full-bodied cab to breathe. Guests love them.
customer_reviews.author: GolfWife

customer_reviews.title: Highly rate this one
customer_reviews.text: Great capacity for whites and cleans beautifully in the Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set but didn’t last two weeks. Somehow they easily break when hand washing. I guess I’m too strong and need to lay off the spinach 🤷🏼‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were a nice quality, just a little larger than I would like. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: M.Ward

product_meta.title: Spiegelau Salute Bordeaux Wine Glasses, Set of 4, European-Made No-Lead Crystal, Classic Stemmed, Dishwasher Safe, Professional Quality Wine Glass Gift Set, 25 oz
product_meta.description: Style Name:BordeauxComing in a classic, timeless design on a high stem, the new wine glass series Salute accompanies wine enjoyment with style. High brilliance, dishwasher safety and durability make these glasses eligible for versatile use.
feature_bullets: EXQUISITE BORDEAUX GLASS SET – This set of wine glasses will take your sipping experience to a new level. Designed with greater height and generous bowl to enhance the aroma and soften tannins of rich reds, this crystal stemware is ideal for entertaining

HIGH-END STEMWARE WITH TIMELESS ELEGANCE – The top choice for wine connoisseurs and world-class hospitality, this award-winning wine glass set elevates your favorite red wine. These premium wine glasses are the perfect gift for a wine lover

FLAWLESS LEAD-FREE CRYSTAL – Spiegelau’s expertise results in unblemished, brilliantly clear glassware. Lead-free and seamless, this refined set of wine glasses highlights the natural hue and viscosity of each wine for a holistic tasting experience

DISHWASHER SAFE – Spiegelau’s Platinum Glass process ensures brilliance and crystal clarity. Even when run through 1,500 dishwasher cycles during testing processes, these wine glasses remained flawless, without scratching, fogging, or loss of brilliance

500 YEARS OF GERMAN CRAFTSMANSHIP – Spiegelau brings centuries of expert craftsmanship to glassware. Spiegelau is part of a proud tradition of elegance and quality, yet perfectly at home with modern lifestyles. Enjoy wine in the glass it deserves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars189 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
